name: Mend Repo Integration with Separate SAST Scanner
summary: Dashboards and Inputs for the Mend Repo Integration with separate SAST scanner
description:
This content pack includes the following dashboards:
  Controller Search
  Scanner Search
  Scanner SAST Search
  Remediate Search

It also includes the following healthchecks for the containers:
  Controller Stats
  Scanner Healthcheck
  Scanner SAST Healthcheck
  Remediate Healthcheck

This content pack also includes the following inputs:
  Mend Repo Integration 
  Remediate Healthcheck 
  Scanner Healthcheck
  Scanner SAST Healthcheck 
  Container CPU/Memory Stats

Alerts:
  Controller CPU/Memory Alerts
  Scan Queue High

Pipeline:
  Creates an on-the-fly calculation for memory and cpu usage percentage.

source.@value:
pipeline "Controller CPU Usage"
stage 0 match either
rule "Calculate CPU Percentage"
rule "Calculate Memory Percentage"
end

widget.27a452a3-c524-421a-ac04-2f42f79419ec: Average Seconds Since Last Scan Request

widget.18fa21e3-07d3-4441-a901-bedbf1c35875: Average Seconds Since Last Scan Request
